ai-tha-ap519:1.3_0: The Buddha is the name of the Sudassana,
ai-tha-ap519:1.4_0: like a mountain cleft in the mountains.
ai-tha-ap519:2.1_0: As a mighty flood sweeps off a sleeping village,
ai-tha-ap519:2.2_0: I’m coming down from the sky.
ai-tha-ap519:3.2_0: Having raised my joined palms to him,
ai-tha-ap519:3.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap519:3.4_0: I’d better betrayed by the great souls.
ai-tha-ap519:4.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap519:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap519:6.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap519:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jayas.
ai-tha-ap519:9.1_0: In the seventh Rains Retreat, the Elder Nun Balled Corpse,
